name: create table readings

sql:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS
info (device_id TEXT UNIQUE, location TEXT);
name: create table info
msg parser
msg parser
check if existing id in info
msg parser
func:
msg.topic = "INSERT OR IGNORE INTO info VALUES (\"" + msg.id + "\", \"" + msg.location + "\");";

return msg;

name: set ids

template:
SELECT
    location
FROM
    info
WHERE
    device_id="{{global.selectedID}}";

name: convert date

template:
SELECT
    timestamp
FROM
    readings
WHERE
    device_id="{{global.selectedID}}"
ORDER BY
    timestamp DESC
LIMIT 1;

name: get voltages
template:
SELECT
    data_id, timestamp, val, unit
FROM
    readings
WHERE
    device_id="{{global.selectedID}}"
AND
    (data_id="batt_voltage"
    OR
    data_id="pv_voltage"
    OR
    data_id="load_voltage")
ORDER BY
    timestamp ASC;

name: create chart
clear chart
func:
msg.payload = [];

return msg;

name: get currents
template:
SELECT
    data_id, timestamp, val, unit
FROM
    readings
WHERE
    device_id="{{global.selectedID}}"
AND
    (data_id="batt_current"
    OR
    data_id="pv_current"
    OR
    data_id="load_current")
ORDER BY
    timestamp ASC;

name: create chart
get battery soc
template:
SELECT
    data_id, timestamp, val
FROM
    readings
WHERE
    device_id="{{global.selectedID}}"
AND
    (data_id="batt_soc")
ORDER BY
    timestamp DESC
LIMIT 1;

sql:
SELECT DISTINCT
    data_id
FROM
    readings
ORDER BY
    data_id ASC;
name: select IDs
set ids

template:
SELECT
    timestamp, val
FROM
    readings
WHERE
    device_id="{{global.selectedID}}"
AND
    data_id="{{global.dataID}}";

name: create chart
select unit
template:
SELECT
    unit
FROM
    readings
WHERE
    device_id="{{global.selectedID}}"
AND
    data_id="{{global.dataID}}";
